page.title: 10LAW AND ORDER
page.content: We drew up a questionnaire to ask the public about the police.A=answers. 1.Do you think the police do a good job?A= generally yes. 2.Do you think the station is in a good place? A=Could be more central. 3.Do you think there is a lot of vandalism?Enough but not excessive. 4.Do you live near the police station? A=not many people lived close . 5.Do you think the police are friendly? A=on the whole police very friendly. 6.Have you ever called the police? A=Yes for burglars,accidents,lost pets. 7.Do any of your relatives work in the force? A=a number did have relatives in the police force. The survey showed that people were on the whole well pleased with the police of Garstang. By M.Houghton,C.Lister.
